title: Successful study skills
brief_description: Produced specially for Australian students undergoing senior years of schooling. Topics covered include: the need to establish a good study environment, good planning and time management principles, whole year planning, weekly timetable, the use of a student diary, the value of library research, stress and how to cope, relaxation techniques. Study guide included.
